text: @marcorubio Blood on your hands, the Governors and Trump!  June 5th 2020: States that have reopened nonessential businesses and eased restrictions meant to curb the spread of the coronavirus are doing “tremendous business,” President Donald Trump said.  Business over Lives...Your all evil!
